name: Reaper Jump
description: Reaper Jump is a game with a genre of endless runner where your goal is to survive as long as possible by avoiding random generated obstacles. The reaper will keep on bouncing back and forth and you need to jump over these obstacles by pressing space bar to avoid death. At a certain score milestone, there's a chance where the obstacles are being generated more than one in a single map, thus a double jump feature is added to survive from the obstacles.
